generated_description: nv classes is a coaching institute based in bengaluru, karnataka, specializing in competitive exam preparation. established in 2009, the institute offers courses for various exams including iit-jee, neet, and kshitij for classes 10 and 11, and jigyasa for classes 9. nv classes focuses on building a strong foundation in subjects such as physics, chemistry, mathematics, and biology, aiming to prepare students for engineering and medical competitive exams. the institute is known for its personalized attention, small class sizes, and comprehensive study materials. nv classes has a high success rate in securing admissions to top-tier colleges like iit, nit, iiit, iiser, and niser.
